name: Berlin Berlin!!
description:
Game Design Project for Game A Week Course under supervision of Prof.Csongor Baranyai

Game Description

The Theme of the Jam being "Berlin". 

The game is a Monochromatic Adventure in a in Berlin as a foreigner.

Repository Link

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/gameaweek_sshrestha_berlin/commits/

Release Notes

Version 0.1

Credits

A solo project by Sagar Shrestha.

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 20)
